QuestData.Title: Saur Loser
QuestData.Description: Inside the Beast Pens you will encounter some of the most skilled beast tamers in the Zandalari military. They are trained to kill with axe, beast, and claw. This is where they build their cavalry.$b$bWe need you to kill any Zandalari you find in there before they can get their mounted monstrosities out into the open battlefield.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 10 Zandalari trolls in the Beast Pens.
